author: Blu Radio
title: Arsenal cayÃ³ en casa ante West Ham y se alejÃ³ de la punta de la Premier League - BluRadio
text: Con una posesiÃ³n del 74 por ciento, con un asedio tan constante como ineficaz durante todo el encuentro sobre la porterÃ­a del West Ham, con 30 remates, ocho entre los tres palos, el [Arsenal](https://www.bluradio.com/deportes/futbol/arsenal-sufre-para-derrotar-a-luton-town-pero-mantiene-liderato-de-la-premier-league-cb20) Lo superÃ³ la efectividad del West Ham, que marcÃ³ dos goles en sus tres Ãºnicos remates a porterÃ­a de todo el encuentro, el Ãºltimo de ellos un penalti detenido por David Raya. Una demostraciÃ³n de pegada y practicidad, iniciada por Tomas Soucek, a pase de Bowen, y culminada por un testarazo de Mavropanos, a centro de Ward-Prowse, pero tambiÃ©n una expresiva resistencia defensiva, a la que colaborÃ³, indispensable, Areola con tres paradas cruciales, sobre todo la primera a Saka con tan solo 0-1 a favor. El West Ham se adelantÃ³ en el minuto 13. Un rechace suelto de Zinchenko, afortunado para el conjunto visitante, le cayÃ³ a Bowen al borde de la lÃ­nea de fondo para reponer el balÃ³n en juego para la llegada de Tomas Soucek, que remachÃ³ el gol. El principio de todo este jueves en el estadio Emirates para relegar al Arsenal de la primera posiciÃ³n. Publicidad En algunas ocasiones, ni siquiera el VAR es suficiente. Ninguna imagen ponÃ­a en duda la legalidad del centro previo de Bowen, al borde de la fuera de fondo, si es que no estaba fuera por milÃ­metros. No habÃ­a ninguna instantÃ¡nea concluyente en el momento exacto. En ese instante, el balÃ³n quedaba detrÃ¡s del cuerpo del delantero, situado sobre la lÃ­nea. El gol, tres minutos despuÃ©s de la revisiÃ³n, entre los gritos del pÃºblico 'no goal' de fondo, fue validado, sin la certeza para nadie de si lo era o no. Ante la duda, el tanto fue legal. Una sorpresa en el estadio Emirates, por la clasificaciÃ³n, pero tambiÃ©n por lo que se habÃ­a visto hasta entonces sobre el campo, con el Arsenal en modo asedio casi desde el principio. Necesitado de una victoria para retener el liderato, tras el triunfo del martes del Liverpool, el Arsenal presionÃ³, acorralÃ³, echÃ³ hacia atrÃ¡s a su rival, lo sometiÃ³ a un estrÃ©s constante antes y despuÃ©s del 0-1, pero se quedÃ³ en apenas dos tiros entre los tres palos, con una magnÃ­fica parada de Areola a Saka, que tambiÃ©n estrellÃ³ un remate en el poste. Publicidad Siempre lo tuvo claro el West Ham, replegado con el 0-1 en contra, incluso antes, con el mexicano Edson Ãlvarez atento a todo, a cada cobertura, a cada segunda jugada. Era su partido. Pasaba por golpear en cada ocasiÃ³n y soportar todo lo demÃ¡s, cada segundo de la ofensiva del bloque local, que insistiÃ³, insistiÃ³ e insistiÃ³ entre la agrupaciÃ³n de jugadores en torno a su porterÃ­a de su oponente, que aprovechÃ³ tambiÃ©n su siguiente oportunidad. Un saque de esquina es mucho mÃ¡s si el golpeo corresponde a Ward-Prowse. En un escenario inigualable, dio su dÃ©cima asistencia de la temporada con un cÃ³rner que puso en la cabeza de Mavropanos. Su testarazo fue igual o mejor que el centro. A la escuadra, lejos de la oposiciÃ³n de David Raya, para el 0-2 en el minuto 55. La sorpresa ya tomÃ³ dimensiÃ³n. AÃºn mÃ¡s, cuando, su tercer acercamiento, fue un penalti, cometido por Declan Rice sobre Emerson. La pena mÃ¡xima la parÃ³ David Raya. Y con el mÃ©rito de la ausencia de Lucas PaquetÃ¡, lesionado en el calentamiento y resistente hasta la media hora del choque, cuando ya dijo basta, se tirÃ³ al suelo y reclamÃ³ el cambio. author: Philip Boateng Kessie
title: Ghanaian Fetish Priest Storms ChurchTo Retrieve Juju He Gave Pastor For His Ministry, Video Trends - YEN.COM.GH
text: Ghanaian Fetish Priest Storms Church To Retrieve Juju He Gave Pastor For His Ministry, Video Trends - A video of a fetish priest and his associates retrieving a charm they gave a pastor has gone viral - Not even attempts by a woman who tried to reason with them to stop what they were doing yielded results - People who saw the video remained divided in their opinion, with many saying the fetish priest and the men want to disgrace the pastor Social media has been thrown into a frenzy after a fetish priest in Ghana and his associates stormed a church premise to retrieve a charm they gave a pastor to use for his ministry. According to the post YEN.com.gh sighted on the X page of @eddie_wrt, the incident happened at the church premises of Vision Power Ministry at Amamole in [Accra](https://yen.com.gh/tags/accra/) on February 22, 2024. The viral video showed the moment the associates of the fetish priest were digging the church's frontage in an attempt to retrieve [the charm they](https://yen.com.gh/people/240134-trotro-mate-vows-girlfriend-juju-denied-loyalty-test/) gave the man of God. As they continued with the act, a middle-aged woman confronted them and tried to reason with them to stop, but they refused and continued until they finally retrieved an item wrapped in a polythene bag believed to be [the charm they were](https://yen.com.gh/127645-kwaku-bonsam-storms-church-collect-juju-pastor-video.html) looking for. The three-minute video had raked in over 60,000 [views and 100 comments at the ](https://twitter.com/i/status/1760928786961269133)time of writing this report. Watch the video Ghanaians share diverse opinions on the video Netizens who thronged the comment section of the video shared diverse opinions, with some saying the so-called charm may have been planted there to disgrace the pastor. Ghanaian man agitated as Omah Lay grinds and kisses his girlfriend on stage at his UK concert, videos [@moniphase](https://twitter.com/moniphase) reacted: If itâ€™s true ..why is the charm they claim they planted there was not dirty in mud?What are they to gain with this planing and plotting @kwaku_piccaso indicated: Yall believe this? cant yall see they want to disgrace the pastor? The pastor needs bodyguards to guard the church auditorium i think another pastor plotted this adwuma adi nu @MullingsJane commented: Wow this rubbish why Ghana church is bringing their self-low like this GH pastor ignores two ladies as they shake their backside in front of him Earlier, YEN.com.gh reported that a Ghanaian pastor in the UK, Eben Ablorh, [refused the sensual advances of two white ladies](https://yen.com.gh/entertainment/celebrities/249085-ghanaian-pastor-rejects-white-ladies-forcefully-shaking-bum-him/) while preaching on the street. The video captured Eben running away from two ladies who used their physical features to distract him while he preached on the street. The ladies bent their backs as they proceeded to shake their backsides vigorously at the Ghanaian pastor without his consent. PAY ATTENTION: [Stay informed and follow us on Google News!](https://news.google.com/publications/CAAiED-kkM3VetXoUfGei2K5uIIqFAgKIhA_pJDN1XrV6FHxnotiubiC?hl=en-US&gl=US&ceid=US%3Aen) Source: YEN.com.gh

author: Harry Diamond
title: Rice says Arsenal 'fully believe' in Champions League hopes
text:
Declan Rice has said Arsenal â€˜fully believeâ€™ the club can win the Champions League this season.
Arsenal progressed into the Champions League semi-finals for the first time since 2008/09 after beating Real Madrid at the Bernabeu on Wednesday evening.
Writing the next chapter â€“ TOGETHER ðŸ‘Š pic.twitter.com/wnVxePE2sY
â€” Arsenal (@Arsenal) April 16, 2025
Goals from Bukayo Saka and Gabriel Martinelli secured a 2-1 win in the Spanish capital and an emphatic 5-1 aggregate win.
Arsenal have eliminated the holders in convincing fashion and will now take on Paris Saint-Germain for a place in the final. Rice believes the Gunners are on the verge of something special and said there is a real belief within the squad that the North Londoners can win the Champions League for the first time this season.
â€œI sensed it when I signed, we were on an upward trajectory for the club,â€ he reflected to TNT Sports.
â€œItâ€™s been tough in the Premier League, but in this competition weâ€™ve done exceptionally well. We all fully believe it. Weâ€™ve got full trust in this manager, heâ€™s unbelievable. Weâ€™ve got young lads who really want it as well. We just want to take tonight in, take it one step at a time. Weâ€™ve got PSG next, who are an amazing team.â€
Rice scored twice in the first leg and claimed the man-of-the-match award in the Bernabeu. The England midfielder hailed the performance from Arsenal, on a â€˜historic nightâ€™ for the club.
â€œBack-to-back [Player of the Match awards]. Itâ€™s such a special night for this club, itâ€™s a historic night for this club. We have an objective in this competition, we want to play the best teams. We want to win this competition.
â€œThere was a lot of talk about [Madrid] coming back, because theyâ€™ve come back so many times before, but we had a lot of confidence about coming here and winning the game. We knew we were going to suffer, but we knew we were going to win. We did it in real life. What a night for the club.â€
